Split Super Shortcuts | This permission gives me the ability to create Multi-Window & Open Apps in Split Screen Simultaneously (Android 7 & Higher)

â™¿ How it Helps People with Disability?
It is difficult for people with disability to open an app Or switch between apps. I am using Accessibility Service to enter Multi-Window Mode to open two apps together.
Split Shortcuts | This Permission Gives Me An Ability To Create Multi-Window & Open Apps in Split Screen Simultaneously

This Permission Allows Me to Create Multi-Window Mode & Open Pair of Apps in Split Screen Simultaneously.
(Android 7 & Higher)

â™¿ How it Helps People with Disability?
It is Difficult for People with Disability to Open an App Or Switch Between Apps.
So, I am Using Accessibility Service to Create Multi-Window Mode to Open Two Apps Together.

Apps Selected by Smart Pick

 Go to Preferences to Disable it

ğŸ”µ Mix Shortcuts ğŸ’  | Replace Several Shortcuts & Folders with One Super Shortcuts with Extra Features
ğŸ’  Combine App/Split/Folder Shortcuts Together ğŸ’ 
• App Shortcuts: Open One App from Super Shortcut
• Split Shortcuts: Open Two Apps Simultaneously in Split Screen (Multi Window)
• Folder Shortcuts: Open List of Apps from Super Shortcut (Press & Hold on Each Apps on the List to Open them in Split Screen)
